TC.Description: Verify the Address tab and Contact tab in Create Personal client
Verify the contents of the checkbox is shown correctly against the corresponding line on the Contact screen before and after submit(View) -Personal client

Verify the list of following lookup options available in contact type lookup:Telephone,Fax,Email,Mobile Phone,Home Telephone Number,Work Telephone Number,Daytime Telephone,Evening Telephone in Create Personal Client
Verify whether the telephone number field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Telephone in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the telephone number field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Mobile Phone in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the telephone number field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Home Telephone Number in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the telephone number field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Work Telephone Number in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the telephone number field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Daytime Telephone in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the telephone number field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Evening Telephone Telephone in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the Email field is visible in Contact modal while selecting the Email in contact type -Personal Client
Verify whether the name of the field Email displayed as 'Email' while selecting the Main email contact option in contact type -Personal Client
Verify the edit,delete, update button and its functionality and try to update after contact creation -Personal client
Verify the Main column in each row in Contact Details screen -Personal Client
Verify the Main checkbox is present on the Contact modal for each option -Personal Client
Verify that Main checkbox selected more than one time for same Contact type then it should throw the error message -Personal Client
Check any new contact details are entered and marked as Main, It will not affect the previous checked box - Personal Client
Verify the contents of the checkbox is shown correctly against the corresponding line on the Contact screen -Personal Client
Verify the heading on the Contact screen is Number / Email -Personal Client
Verify the order of the columns on the Contact screen are Type | Description |Number / Email | Extension | Main(Broker) -Personal Client
